pages.title: Modifiers
pages.text: Some enchantments can also be spent to get modifiers. $(br)Those can be quite beneficial. $(br)You just need the highlighted Item and an enchanting table with an item frame in front of it. $(br)Drop all the enchantments on the enchanting table, put the item to enchant into the item frame, and use the highlighted item on the frame.
Shortly the enchantments will be consumed, it will continue consuming as long as the blocks arent unloaded or the item is taken out from the item frame
